title: ATP World Tour 250, Quito Men's Singles Seeds Progress
text: February 9, 2018 / 1:01 AM / Updated 20 hours ago ATP World Tour 250, Quito Men's Singles Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 2 Min Read Feb 9 (OPTA) - Seeds Progress from the ATP World Tour 250, Quito Men's Singles matches on Thursday .. Seeds ..
